name: @tpmjs/createblogpost
description: A tool for creating structured blog posts with AI-generated content

tools.description: Creates structured blog posts with customizable frontmatter, content sections, and SEO metadata. Supports multiple output formats including Markdown and MDX.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the blog post

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: The author of the blog post

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The main content of the blog post

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format for the blog post

parameters.name: excerpt
parameters.description: Short excerpt or summary of the post

returns.description: A structured blog post object with frontmatter, content, and metadata including slug, wordCount, readingTime, and formattedOutput

aiAgent.useCase: Use this tool when users need to generate blog posts, articles, or structured content with proper frontmatter and metadata. Ideal for content management systems, static site generators, and documentation sites.
aiAgent.limitations: Does not include AI content generation - you must provide the content. Only formats and structures existing content.
examples: Create a blog post about TypeScript best practices
Generate a tutorial post with code examples
Format an article with SEO metadata
